>
[Weight of Guilt](/Feats.aspx?ID=217) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 110 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[redeemer cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your [Glimpse of Redemption](/Actions.aspx?ID=6). Instead of making the triggering creature enfeebled 2, you can make it stupefied 2 for the same duration.
